pieces.title: Interests
pieces.content: Active person who enjoys cycling, running and snowboarding. Hobbies include cooking and DIY.

pieces.title: Summary
pieces.content:
Motivated experienced Web Developer seeking a career in a dynamic software development team. Highly competent front-end development skills, with an emphasis on JavaScript and its libraries (ReactJS, jQuery). Confident back-end development skills, especially using PHP and NodeJS.

Self-taught, with a real interest in keeping up-to-date with the latest web standards, languages and methods. Makes extensive use of tools such as Git, Webpack, Grunt to boost productivity and achieve the best results possible. A deep understanding of how computers and the internet works. High level of technical and networking skills.

pieces.title: Projects
pieces.content:
• Almondsbury

    Garden center project build on Drupal 8. A unique feature is to show specific block based on time schedule and weather conditions.

    Go to site...
  • Make My Blinds

    Magento 2 online shop. Capable of selling blinds of custom measurements. Loads of other custom functionality.

    Go to site...
  • Ascenti

    Drupal 8 project. System to manage cliniks across UK. Frontend clinic finder APP build using React.

    Go to site...
  • Noah's Ark Zoo Farm

    Custom build CMS to manage animals in the zoo. Build using FatFree PHP framework, as well as frontend development using given design files.

    Go to site...
  • Futures Centre
    Futures Centre

    Users share their opinions and posts comments based on their experiences. Drupal website created from design files. A lot of frontend and backend functionality is done. Overall amazing look and feel UI/UX achieved.

    Go to site...
  • Food & Drink

    Main goal and purpose achieved. Fully responsive eye catchy website created. Drupal template developed from Sketch design provided.

    Go to site...
  • Jovaitas

    A freelance project built using Drupal Commerce. Design and functionality were created in order to meet all client requirements.

    Go to site...
  • Entertainment

    Dynamic website built by Drupal 7. A template is coded in order to meet the client’s requirements. To boost the best performance criteria used only the minimum of plugins and extra functionality was hard coded.

    Go to site...
  • Segris

    Redesigned the Opencart online shop. Great considerable efforts made for the major development of website design, layout and responsiveness achieved.

    Go to site...

pieces.title: Experience
pieces.content:
10/16 - 02/19 Software Developer at Creation Media, Bristol

Building and maintaining Drupal, WordPress, Magento and custom platforms. Taking care of full-stack responsibilities as well as managing AWS and common LAMP stack. Writing extensive API's. Working collaboratively with a team.

01/16 - 10/16 Web Developer at Southmedia Ltd., Bristol

Responsible for front-end and back-end development of Drupal or WordPress CMS. Typically working from designs, but often given free rein on improving existing websites. Whether working individually or with a small team and constantly striving to operate within timescales and hit targets.

03/13 – 12/15 freelancing web designer/developer

Creating websites with Drupal, developing themes and modules. Building SPA's with Angular1. Maintaining already build systems. Constantly working with HTML, CSS and JS. Experience with MVC pattern. Creating designs with Adobe suite.

06/10 - 12/12 Leader, developer. Electric-Shop-Online, Lithuania

Maintaining the main online shop. Repairing, installing and maintaining consumer grade digital equipment.
